rrls.configuration.title: Remove Reloading Screen
rrls.configuration.miniRender: Render a mini (aka hidden) version of the overlay
rrls.configuration.enableScissor: Trim the rendering of the default overlay
rrls.configuration.enableScissor.tooltip: Enable this if the window is flooded with color (mostly black)
rrls.configuration.type: What will be displayed on reloading
rrls.configuration.reloadText: The text that will be displayed if TEXT is selected above
rrls.configuration.reInitScreen: Reinitializing the current screen after a reload
rrls.configuration.reInitScreen.tooltip: Disabling this feature may eliminate the hang-up after the reload is complete
rrls.configuration.earlyPackStatusSend: Early sending of status about server resourcepack
rrls.configuration.earlyPackStatusSend.t:
Some servers specifically wait for the player to load resources, because of this the game may be displayed incorrectly
Example: You were underground while reloading resources
rrls.configuration.doubleLoad: Reload resources again if an error occurs
rrls.configuration.skipForgeOverlay: Replace the (Neo)Forge loading overlay with vanilla
